title: Countrywide power transmission system restored: Power Division
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 13 (APP):Ministry of Power Division on Thursday said that power transmission system has fully been restored across the country.
Disruption occurred in two 500 kV transmission lines at the morning in South of Karachi has completely been cleared, said a statement issued by the Ministry.
Power supply was being increased from alternative power plants which would become normal by Fridayâ€™s morning.
